conclusion: Analyze the motion of the metal rod and the induced current, as well as the power required by the external force.
Induced emf is given by \(\mathcal{E} = B \cdot l \cdot v\).
Resistance of the loop consists of the resistance of the rod \(R\).
Ratio of the currents \(I_1\) and \(I_2\) is \(\frac{1}{2}\).
Power required by the external force is \(P = B \cdot I \cdot v\).
Ratio of the powers \(P_1\) and \(P_2\) is \(\frac{1}{4}\).
Final answers: Ratio of the loop currents is \(1:2\), ratio of the powers is \(1:4\).
